meanings.definition: The pieces of armor that protect the knees.
meanings.sent1: The knight's kneepieces were shiny and strong.
meanings.sent2: She fell, but luckily her kneepieces absorbed the impact.
meanings.sent3: The kneepieces clanked loudly as the knight tried to tiptoe.
meanings.sent4: His determination was his kneepieces in the battle of life.
meanings.sent5: The blacksmith crafted the kneepieces with intricate designs.

meanings.definition: The parts of a pair of eyeglasses that rest on the nose and behind the ears.
meanings.sent1: Her new glasses had comfortable kneepieces that didn't pinch.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the kneepieces of his glasses to fit better.
meanings.sent3: The kneepieces of the glasses made him look like a wise owl.
meanings.sent4: Her vision was clearer with the sturdy kneepieces of the glasses.
meanings.sent5: The designer frames had stylish kneepieces for a modern look.
